thread.title: NFL: Seahawks escape on a fumbled call - Football
thread.title_full: NFL: Seahawks escape on a fumbled call - Football - NorthJersey.com

author: FROM NEWS SERVICE REPORTS |
title: NFL: Seahawks escape on a fumbled call - Football
text:
SEATTLE â€” Kam Chancellor punched the ball away from Charles Johnson inside the Seattle 1 with 1:45 remaining as the Seahawks held off the Detroit Lions, 13-10, Monday.
The ball bounced into the end zone, where it was nudged over the back line by K.J. Wright and incorrectly ruled a touchback for Seattle, NFL VP of officials Dean Blandino told ESPN. Wright should have been called for illegal touching for hitting the ball out of the end zone, which would have given the ball back to Detroit inside the Seattle 1.
